GapFillDragDrop.Title: Quantifiers
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Choose a word from the pool and drag it to the correct space.

Content.Question:
1. There’s a cinema in the main street.
2. There aren’t any sports facilities – not even a football pitch.
3. There’s not much pollution.
4. There are several Internet cafés.
5. There are a lot of shops.
6. There aren’t enough places to eat, only a pizza restaurant and a couple of cafés.
7. There are too many lorries in the town centre.
8. There are plenty of car parks.
9. There are no theatres but they’re going to build our first one next year.
10. There are lots of banks and cash machines.
